name: 4Corners Solitaire
description:
Looking for a different type of solitaire game to play? 4Corners Solitaire is exactly what you need.

This laid back single person game has a simple goal, move all the cards in increasing order to the corners (while following suits). To help you along, you can build piles in descending order regardless of suit.

While easy to play, 4Corners Solitaire is a very challenging game to win!

Features:
- Universal application which runs on the iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch.
- High resolution graphics designed for the iPad.
- Large, easy to read cards.
- Double tap ability to move cards to the corners.
- Option to swap the Draw and Discard piles.
- Games play, games won, best score statistics kept.
